resources.string: Please Confirm You’ve Read The User Agreement And Privacy Policy
Press Again To Exit The Program
During use, the application requires access to location permissions to record and calibrate motion tracks and distances
Watch SD card in use, terminate transmission
Are You Sure You Want To Delete This Data？
Are You Sure You Want To Log Out？
Watch Is Not connected，Data Will Be Synced To The Watch The Next Time You Connect
In order to improve the stability of the watch connection, it is recommended that you make the following Settings:

If the power-saving mode is turned on, it may cause problems such as unstable Bluetooth connection, abnormal movement trajectory and reduced power distance. It is recommended to turn off the power-saving mode while in use.
Set the method of background protection::
1)Enter Bluetooth Function In Watch\n2)Search For Bluetooth Devices-Select Phone Bluetooth name\n3)Pair With Your Phone To Make Bluetooth Calls With Your Watch
Enter System Setting-Bluetooth-Paired Device, Find Device, Enter Click "Unpair", Unpair Successful。\n\nRemark: Watch Cannot Use Bluetooth Call Function After Unpairing
Make sure the bluetooth of both the phone and watch is enabled
Click the device bar in the "Mine" interface to enter the search device interface.
Select your watch according to the device name and LE Address in the watch information interface
The APP will pop up a Bluetooth pairing request, and the pairing will be completed after confirmation
Measurement is only for reference, not as a Medical Certificate
Login Expired, Please Log In Again
Please Enter The Correct Email Format
Network Response Timeout，Please Check The Network Connection
mycandy Needs To Forward Application Notifications To Remote Smart Devices. Press\"Confirm\"Enter Notification Page To Activate.
Permission Failed, Can Not Turn On Camera Function
Permission Failed，Will Not Be Able To Search The Device List
Permission Failed, Unable To Turn On SMS Notifications

Thank you for trusting and using mycandy. 

 We will help you to understand our collection, use and storage of your personal information and your relevant rights according to the User Privacy Agreement. 

 When you use the mycandy app, we will collect your device information, personal information (avatar, nickname, height, weight, exercise data) and other information. We need to get your camera permissions, photo album permissions to upload your app avatar: 

 When you use the mycandy application to run outdoors, upload, share and store exercise information, we need to obtain your location permissions and other purposes to record your running track. 

 You can access, modify, delete your personal information or manage your authorization in the relevant pages. 

 We use industry-leading security technology to protect your personal information. 

 When you click "OK", you agree to the terms of this Agreement.

Visiter mode does not support this feature

\\n\\n You can access, modify, delete your personal information or manage your authorization in the relevant pages.

Active notification service in your accessibility setting. This allows Bluetooth to push application notifications to remote device.
